<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Multicast Config (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/sites/{site_id}/elements/{element_id}/multicastglobalconfigs/{config_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List the existing multicast global configuration.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the site.","in":"path","name":"site_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Site Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the element.","in":"path","name":"element_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Element Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The multicast config ID.","in":"path","name":"config_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Config Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful Operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The ID of the multicast config.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"spt_switchover_enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates that the first multicast packet is received i.e. the source address is received by the receiver, the DR at the receiverâ€™s end and the RP choose the optimal path to relay information from the source to the receiver.      \n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"spt_switchover_enabled\": true\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
